channel.title: Attack Objects [Send message + XP]

item.title: Attack Objects [Send message + XP]
item.dc:creator: @eXtrosion eXtrosion
item.description:
@eXtrosion wrote:

Hello again… I’m not havnig a good day today with server coding… I used to be able to do s*it but nowadays I’ve become sloppy

Just for practice I want to make a row of dummies and when you click on them you get 300 atk xp and a message

so in client.java I have makeglobal object line

makeGlobalObject(3233, 3533, 823, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3232, 3533, 823, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3231, 3533, 823, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3230, 3533, 823, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3229, 3533, 823, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3228, 3533, 823, -1, 10);
and they show up, thats fine…

and here is what I can’t get working

if (objectID == 823) { //dummy sendMessage("You Gain ATK XP by hitting the dummy!"); addSkillXP(300, 1); }

Is there anything else i have to add… or something is wrong in the above code?
when I click on dummy nothing happens

-Waves, eXtrosion
